apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the kiss between two women with medium-dark skin tones portrays a tender and intimate moment, with soft lighting and subtle 3D shading adding warmth to their connection. The emoji features gentle, rounded edges, emphasizing the natural curve of their embrace and the affectionate gesture. This emoji on Apple devices beautifully represents same-sex relationships, love, and romantic affection, fostering inclusivity in digital expression.
